name: Black and Orange Recipe: Dark Chocolate, Mint, and Pumpkin Gelato Patch
description: Editor's Note: Since it's the last Wednesday in October, this will conclude our black and orange recipe feature. Thank you Kerry for creating each one! I find that it pays off to seriously invest your time in a main course,...
recipeIngredient: 1 pint of pumpkin gelato, which will yield at least the 6 scoops you need
6 silicone baking cups, or 6 paper cupcake wrappers and a cupcake tin

recipeInstructions.text: Using a double boiler, melt the chocolate and add the cream.
Using a pastry brush, brush the inside of 6 silicone baking cups with an even layer of chocolate.
Place the cups in the freezer for 15 minutes, until frozen through. Then repeat the process with a second layer of chocolate, and freeze again for 1 hour.
Scoop in one perfect round scoop of pumpkin gelato.
Top with a sprig of mint and arrange into a pumpkin patch on your plate.
